thread.title: Stonebridge Companies’ Holiday Inn Express & Suites Denver Airport Upgraded Wireless Internet Service
thread.title_full: Stonebridge Companies’ Holiday Inn Express & Suites Denver Airport Announces Upgraded Wireless Internet Service

author: Maggie Mistovich
title: Stonebridge Companies’ Holiday Inn Express & Suites Denver Airport Upgraded Wireless Internet Service
text:
Holiday Inn Express & Suites Denver Airport recently announced an upgrade to the hotel’s Wi-Fi after various guest complaints of poor Wi-Fi service during their stay. Wireless Internet has always been complimentary to all guests, throughout the hotel, but with the recent upgrade, more devices can be used at the same time, making guests’ stays more convenient. Holiday Inn Express & Suites would like to welcome back guests who’ve had issues with the Wi-Fi before with the promise of a better Internet experience throughout the hotel. Guest feedback led to the upgraded system with frequent guests expressing pleasure in the new change. Within easy driving distance to Denver International Airport, Holiday Inn Express & Suites Denver Airport is perfect for both business and leisure travelers. Free 24/7 airport shuttle service, fitness center, complimentary Wi-Fi, indoor pool, free breakfast and much more, make this airport hotel one of the best. Travelers looking for close accommodations to Lockheed, Raytheon, BAE, Buckley Air Force Base, and more will be pleasantly surprised with the hotel’s close proximity. Guest rooms include king, queen and accessible rooms available upon request.
For more information or to make reservations, please call (303) 373-4100 or visit http://www.holidayinnexpressdia.com . Holiday Inn Express & Suites Denver Airport is proudly managed by Stonebridge Companies in Denver, Colo.
Founded in 1991 by Navin C. Dimond, Stonebridge Companies is a privately owned, innovative hotel owner, operator and developer headquartered near Denver. Its diverse listing of properties includes select-service, extended-stay, mid-scale and full-service hotels in markets throughout the U.S. For detailed information, visit http://www.sbcos.com .
